title: Trust more important than ecology to gain local support for conservation

title_detail.value: Trust more important than ecology to gain local support for conservation

summary: Trust, transparency, communication, and fairness in the planning and management of conservation projects may be more important for gaining long-term local support than emphasizing ecological effectiveness, research has discovered.

summary_detail.value: Trust, transparency, communication, and fairness in the planning and management of conservation projects may be more important for gaining long-term local support than emphasizing ecological effectiveness, research has discovered.
